reference_image_path_and_text_pairs:
The composition and background are correct but some elements may be wrong. The wrong elements should be replaced.
Wrong elements: All visual content, as CAMERA_7 is explicitly a black screen..
You must select this image as the main reference and replace the characters in the image with the provided character portraits. Don't change the background.
text_prompt:
Create an image following the given description: 
A photorealistic medieval fantasy shot, adhering to HBO prestige television quality. The frame must be an image of absolute, total blackness. There are no discernible visual elements, characters, or environmental details. The image is a complete visual void, suggesting an abrupt cut to nothingness. The visual style must strictly adhere to: Photorealistic medieval fantasy, HBO prestige television quality, shot on Arri Alexa 65 with Panavision anamorphic lenses. Real human actors in practical costumes — genuine leather, real chainmail, wool, silk, mud, rust, sweat. Natural skin with pores, imperfections, scars, freckles, and weathering. Real weather — mist, firelight, torchlight, dawn light. Warm golden palette for the peaceful kingdom, cold blue-grey for the coup and escape, rich dark crimson-and-black for the Witch's scenes, warm earthy tones for the village, luminous golden light for magic scenes. Deep chiaroscuro shadows, shallow depth of field with creamy anamorphic bokeh, 35mm film grain texture. Every surface tactile — stone, iron, parchment, silk, fur, moss, wet rock, candlewax. NOT video game, NOT CGI render, NOT digital art, NOT World of Warcraft, NOT clean fantasy, NOT anime, NOT cartoon, NOT illustrated, NOT stylized, NOT 3D render, NOT Unreal Engine, NOT polished/perfect skin, NOT plastic armor, NOT oversaturated colors. The scene and lighting MUST strictly reference Image 0, which is a completely black screen representing a total visual void.
